content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I recall that the user used the "google" command to search for information on the Quechua language and accessed the Wikipedia page using the "browse_website" command. The user then requested to write the information to a file named "inca_empire.txt", which was successful. They also attempted to list files in the current directory and read a file with a filename of ".", but these commands should not be executed again with the same arguments. My computer executed the shell command "ls | grep inca_empire.txt" successfully. The user then requested to read the file "inca_empire.txt" and my computer returned the information on the Inca Empire as previously described. In the latest development, the user used the "write_to_file" command to create a file named "quechua_language.txt" with information on the Quechua language, including its family, dialects, and cultural significance. The command was successful and returned "File written to successfully." However, when the user attempted to list files in the current directory using the "list_files" command with the argument of ".", my computer returned an error message advising against executing the command with the same arguments again.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "."}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: Error: [Errno 21] Is a directory: '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls | grep inca_empire.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'inca_empire.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "inca_empire.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command read_file returned: The Inca Empire was a pre-Columbian civilization that existed in South America from the early 13th century until the Spanish conquest in the 16th century. It was the largest empire in pre-Columbian America, centered in the Andean Mountains, and known for its monumental architecture, extensive road network, finely-woven textiles, use of knotted strings for record keeping and communication, agricultural innovations, and unique system of exchange based on reciprocity. The empire was organized into a central government with the Inca at its head and four provincial governments with strong leaders. The Inca society was linguistically diverse, with Quechua being the most important language. The Inca religion was polytheistic and centered around the worship of nature deities. The empire was eventually conquered by the Spanish, leading to the downfall of the Inca civilization.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Quechua language"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quechuan_languages", "https://www.mustgo.com/worldlanguages/quechua/", "https://plc.sas.upenn.edu/quechua", "https://www.gviusa.com/blog/quechua-the-surviving-language-of-the-inca-empire/", "https://web.sas.upenn.edu/quechua/", "https://www.worldbank.org/en/news/feature/2014/04/16/discriminados-por-hablar-su-idioma-natal-peru-quechua", "https://chss.rowan.edu/home_page_highlights/mother_tongue.html", "https://omniglot.com/writing/quechua.htm"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quechuan_languages", "question": "What is the Quechua language?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The Quechua language is a family of indigenous languages spoken primarily in the Andes region of South America, including Peru, Bolivia, Ecuador, Colombia, and Chile. It is the most widely spoken pre-Columbian language family of the Americas, with an estimated 8-10 million speakers as of 2004. Quechua was the main language family of the Inca Empire and is still widely spoken today, being the co-official language of many regions and the second most spoken language family in Peru. The language has been recognized as an official language in Peru, Ecuador, and Bolivia. The text provides additional information on the grammar, dialects, and cultural significance of the Quechua language. \n \n Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quechuan_languages#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "quechua_language.txt", "text": "The Quechua language is a family of indigenous languages spoken primarily in the Andes region of South America, including Peru, Bolivia, Ecuador, Colombia, and Chile. It is the most widely spoken pre-Columbian language family of the Americas, with an estimated 8-10 million speakers as of 2004. Quechua was the main language family of the Inca Empire and is still widely spoken today, being the co-official language of many regions and the second most spoken language family in Peru. The language has been recognized as an official language in Peru, Ecuador, and Bolivia."}}}'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command list_files returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'11f50022-d20e-4ac3-8c56-27037fb6f398.jpg\\n3ed56d47-46c9-4b57-b155-b82547eb0e5b.jpg\\n4aadd929-1f10-48d8-945c-503e9146556a.jpg\\n67ef5761-ae9c-49c2-a7ec-d626e3d91c2f.jpg\\n85c0e74f-76ba-4cc8-aae3-32551bcf877b.jpg\\n8dc3b97e-9502-4695-90cc-61ca4425cf64.jpg\\nactivities_to_do.txt\\natlas.settings.yaml\\natlas.yaml\\nauto_gpt_workspace\\nb6f22804-1321-4f17-81b9-ca2ae3e29c35.jpg\\nbc7004c9-c9de-41ba-80b6-aa89701f46d2.jpg\\nbest_museums_nyc.txt\\nc4756fca-0651-43f2-99c2-cd7813ddd878.jpg\\nc6ea38d4-4722-4d50-8291-9883f6b5e3c6.jpg\\ncurrent_exhibitions_metropolitan_museum_of_art.txt\\ndata.csv\\ne7f40b61-a9cb-4eed-9d7b-0ad71f46831c.jpg\\neiffel_tower_history.txt\\nff081e48-d751-4518-8d8b-7d5c365c5046.jpg\\nfile_logger.txt\\nfinal_activities_to_do.txt\\nfun_activities.txt\\nfun_activities_nyc.txt\\nfun_things_to_do_in_nature_US.txt\\nhello_world.py\\nimages\\ninca_empire.txt\\njpg_files.tar.gz\\nlanguage_learning_resources.txt\\nlanguage_resources.txt\\nmachu_picchu.txt\\nmartial_arts\\nmartial_arts_info.txt\\nmartial_arts_poem.txt\\nmartial_arts_summary.txt\\nmessage.txt\\nmy_project\\nmy_script.py\\nnew_file.txt\\noctopus_tech.py\\noctopus_tech_applications.txt\\noctopus_tech_research.txt\\noctopus_tech_updated.py\\noctopus_urls.txt\\npandas_analysis.py\\nquechua_language.txt\\nscavenger_hunt_ideas.txt\\nscavenger_hunt_links.txt\\nscikit-learn\\nsend_random_tweet.py\\nsouth_africa_activities.txt\\nsubway_surfers_facts.txt\\nsubway_surfers_updates.txt\\ntest.lisp\\ntop_attractions.txt\\ntop_language_learning_resources.txt\\ntop_python_libraries.txt\\ntravel_destinations.txt\\ntree_output.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''"}]
